Name: Asyula 方舟之链
About the game: Story After the unification war of the Kingdom, rebels appeared in the Capital. Although the rebellion was quickly suppressed, there were still a number of remnants at large. Two years later, the main character of the game, Asyula, received an order to pursue the leader of remnant rebellious forces, Awillou. Game Features Team is composed of 2 characters with a total of 3 operational roles. Exploration of field maps, interaction with NPCs and receiving tasks, transactions in stores, battles in the field when encountering enemy. Turn-based combat RPG, characters can choose various operations in a battle in their turns respectively, without time limit. SkillLink command: you can edit the SkillLink skills for each characters, the proper use of the SkillLink may reverse the situation. Weapon proficiency: all weapons have proficiencies. Before a new weapon brings into play normally, it must be used for a period of time, or it may be no more than a skilled low-level weapon. Supporter: Triggering special NPCs' events increases favorable impression to obtain their trusts and get their supports in the battle. StarStone magic: you can buy or collect all kinds of [StarStone] from stores or in the fields. Equipting different StarStones will enable you use different magics. The battle randomly triggers a variety of bonus. Carefully change the action orders can help you get the advantage of Bonus. Environmental effects & Traps in the field: there are different environmental effects and traps in the wild which are needed to deal with carefully! 32 achievements are available in the game.
